entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
